alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Morrill County through 715 PM MDT... At 639 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, or 29 miles south of Alliance, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 and Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
